column5: Just before I got to fly.I thought I would ask,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  HOW DO I DO THIS??????????????????????????????????????  I have photo bucket as a host.  Thanks  Im off to BBQ.
Download photostory 3 and put your pictures to sound and motion.  Easy to use and does a decent job. Here's an example A Fisherman's Christmas

Thanks Roger. I,ll check it out once I have things here up and running faster. I was just told that it,s got to be the server.Everyone gets home this time of night and it slows down here.Usually Im playing poker and never notice.LOL Thanks again  BTW,any word on those TBA locals?
